## handleHashChangeFeature variable

This feature allows to intercept clicks on anchors (`<a>`<!-- -->). By default, it will prevent the click from propagating. But you can disable this option.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
handleHashChangeFeature: EventFeatureOf<HandleHashChangeOptions, 'onDOMHashChange', HashChangeEvent>
```
